title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: B.Y.O.B.Be Your Own BankAfter four successful series of coins, the BYOB team has decided that the Series 4: Hope & Despair 2-coin copper set will be our last release and we would like to thank all the collectors who have been a part!! And none of this would have been possible without Hhampuz who was the visionary behind the whole thing.  SERIES 1: BANKERS BTCEWARESERIES 2: FEDERAL NO MORESERIES 3: THE M.O.A.B.SERIES 4: HOPE & DESPAIRSince there will no more coin series made by us, we are offering the remaining coin boxes for saleThe buyer can continue the series in their own style or remake it to be a completely new ideaThere are 375+ boxes remaining. PM me me if interested

comments.author: Bullion-n-BTC
comments.body: So there is still coins from each release still available? If so how much per each silver wallet?

comments.author: minerjones
comments.created_time: June 26, 2022, 09:32:52 PMLast edit: June 26, 2022, 11:55:05 PM by minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Bullion-n-BTC on June 26, 2022, 08:58:19 PMSo there is still coins from each release still available? If so how much per each silver wallet?Series 1, 2, 3 are sold out.Series 4 coin set will still be for sale while available: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5368199.0They are $50 in fiat or crypto

comments.author: digicoinuser
comments.body: Thanks Hhampuz & MJ for a great series and allowing me to assist with the certificates!

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: digicoinuser on July 05, 2022, 03:24:27 AMThanks Hhampuz & MJ for a great series and allowing me to assist with the certificates! Yes, a big thanks to you for your help  They always turned out very nice

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Price - I might be willing to do a “5th”

comments.author: hotdog7
comments.body: Which sets are still for purchase?

comments.author: aoluain

comments.body: Quote from: hotdog7 on January 21, 2023, 01:36:42 AMWhich sets are still for purchase?Quote from: minerjones on June 26, 2022, 09:32:52 PMQuote from: Bullion-n-BTC on June 26, 2022, 08:58:19 PMSo there is still coins from each release still available? If so how much per each silver wallet?Series 1, 2, 3 are sold out.Series 4 coin set will still be for sale while available: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5368199.0They are $50 in fiat or crypto I have a set of the series 4 "Hope and Despair".For a 2 coin set with holograms, certificates and presentation boxes the priceof $50 is really good value.So you can buy the series 4 set from the thread above or you can buy some empty presentation boxes to use for other coins of the same size.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Oh, forgot about these. Please reserve a #4 set, if available serial 66, otherwise random!For anyone looking for a full collection, I am offering a serial 55 set of silvercoins #1, #2 and #3 here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5434853.msg61621116#msg61621116(hope it's okay to post in this thread - maybe encourages someone to get a full collection including the copper coins here).

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I have series 2, 3 and 4 - but do not have a series 1  if anyone has an extra for sale or trade please let me know.I know kryptowerk has a series 1 but he has matching numbers and I should not break that up.
